sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Menu = () => { return (

Our Menu

{/* Spaghetti Pomodoro */}

Spaghetti Pomodoro

A classic Italian dish with rich tomato sauce.

{/* Grilled Lamb */}

Grilled Lamb

Perfectly grilled lamb served with a side of risotto.

{/* Pasta alla Boscaiola */}

Pasta alla Boscaiola

A hearty pasta with mushrooms, pancetta, and a creamy sauce.

{/* Braciole */}

Braciole

Italian beef rolls stuffed with herbs and Parmesan cheese.

{/* Fettuccine Alfredo */}

Fettuccine Alfredo

Delicious pasta in a rich Alfredo sauce.

{/* Funghi e Tartufo Pizza */}

Funghi e Tartufo Pizza

A gourmet pizza with mushrooms and truffle oil.

{/* Lasagna */}

Lasagna

Layers of pasta, ricotta, and meat sauce.

{/* Margherita Pizza */}

Margherita Pizza

Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.

{/* Pannacotta */}

Pannacotta

Rich and creamy dessert topped with berry compote.

{/* Tiramisu */}

Tiramisu

Classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers.

); }; export default Menu;
